net.kuujo.vertigo.io.batch

Interface MessageBatch<T extends MessageBatch<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The batch type.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InputBatch, OutputBatch

    public interface MessageBatch<T extends MessageBatch<T>>
    Base interface for batches. Batches represent collections of messages over time.

    As opposed to groups, batches are collections of messages that can be sent to any target component instance. Batches simply delimit a group of messages output from a given component during a time window.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
